summary: One night. One apartment. One missing person. Rami takes his dog on a walk and does not return. He disappeared. His wife, Shir, is clueless as to his whereabouts. Different people come in ... See full summary Â»
cast: Tamar Alkan|Tom Antopolsky|Shlomi Avraham|Yoav Donat|Eli Gorenstein|Gilad Kahana|Rodia Kozlovski|Alit Kreiz|Roy Miller|Amitay Yaish Ben Ousilio|Ruth Rasiuk|Ze'ev Shimshoni
title: The Man in the Wall
